short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to add RTL (Right-to-Left) support for Farsi in Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Notion RTL Extension for Persian and Arabic is a volunteer-driven project created by Amir Shokri in collaboration with the Persian Notion Community. This tool is designed to enhance the experience of Persian- and Arabic-speaking users in the Notion workspace. It helps display text in a right-to-left orientation, aligned with the structure of RTL languages like Persian and Arabic. With this extension, you can manage your documents and notes in Notion more professionally and with improved readability.
